title: The Favorites - NFL Conference Championship Gambling Preview
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFL Conference Championship Gambling Preview
description:
After an exhilarating weekend of NFL playoff betting, Chad Millman and professional sports bettor Simon Hunter are here to preview the penultimate weekend of the NFL playoffs. Together they preview both Conference Championship games, going deep on trends for both the sides and totals. Do the 49ers have what it takes to beat the Rams again? Will the Bengals keep it close in Arrowhead? Plus, after the Buffalo Bills lost a gut-wrenching game to the Kansas City Chiefs on Sunday night, producer Matt Mitchell comes on to describe the path forward for both himself and his neighborhood.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
